Comments_List: I learned about different topics in International Economics, including sovereign debt, financial crises, exchange rates etc.
Advanced course about international finance with focus on a lot of topics

Strengths: 1) It covers many different topics in International Economics.
                   2) The visitors were distinguished people of this field and gave nice lectures.
                   3) The course covered both theoretical and empirical topics.

Weakness: 1) There was no lecture in fiscal policy.
Cover a lot of topics with exercise to practice.

Yes, I would recommend the course to another student because it is crucial to get knowledge on topics related to International Economics. Every country is an open economy and economic analysis and economic policy should always take this into account. In some cases, the openness of the economy can have dramatic effects on a policy which is effective for a closed economy.
Yes, if this student is interested in international finance
